DOC.brief_summary: This project evaluate effects of a commonly used food supplement on glucose metabolism and cognitive function.
DOC.brief_title: Effects on Metabolism and Cognitive Functions of a Commonly Used Commercial Food Supplement
DOC.detailed_description: The test product has previously been suggested to elicit beneficial effects on glucose metabolism and cognitive performance. The purpose with this study is to evaluate metabolic effects and effects on mood variables of the test product provided at breakfast. Test variables are determined at fating and postprandial a standardised breakfast. The results are compared with effects after a placebo product.
DOC.criteria: age between 4060 years, normal BMI, healthy, nonsmokers metabolic disorders or gastro intestinal disease, intake of probiotics or antibiotics during the last 2 weeks prior to the study.
